title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.51 - Change of ownership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.51 - Change of ownership

State Regulations
A change in the entity which has ultimate legal
responsibility for the operation of a provider and thus for decisions and for
liabilities arising in the course of its operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.51

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
